summary: A series of interviews are conducted with convicted serial killer Ted Bundy in hopes of gaining insight into the Green River Killer who is terrorizing Seattle.
cast: Bruce Greenwood|Sam Jaeger|Sarah Manninen|Kathleen Quinlan|Cary Elwes|David Lawrence Brown|Jeremy Akerman|Cindy Sampson|Richard Blackburn|Mark Graham|John Dunsworth|Sherry Smith|Lee J. Campbell|Leah Ostry|Colin Rogers|Grant Rogers|Venessa Brooks|Tara McCalla|Marie Panopalis|Michael Pellerin|David Christoffel|Renee Abbott|Cassie MacDonald|John Fulton|Sonja O'Hara|Don Bottomley|Geordie Brown|Kerry McPherson|Wanda Taylor|Nikki Timmons
keywords: investigation|police detective|scene of the crime|man wears eyeglasses|psycho murderer
title: El asesino de Green River
